title: Ship hoogle.xml documentation with plugin
description: Copy hoogle.xml reference documentation into the plugin for Claude to reference. COMMIT 4: docs: add hoogle.xml reference documentation

title: Create plugin directory structure and manifest
description: Create .claude-plugin/plugin.json manifest and directory structure. COMMIT 1: feat: add plugin structure and manifest

title: Create SKILL.md for hoogle skill
description: Create skills/hoogle/SKILL.md that tells Claude when/how to use hoogle for Haskell API lookups. COMMIT 3: feat: add hoogle skill and slash command (commit with q4n)

title: Create /hoogle slash command
description: Create commands/hoogle.md slash command for users to query hoogle directly. COMMIT 3: feat: add hoogle skill and slash command (commit with csr)

title: Write tests for hoogle wrapper (many/no/single results)
description: Write tests for hoogle wrapper covering: many results, no results, single result scenarios. Do NOT ship with plugin. COMMIT 5: test: add hoogle wrapper tests

title: Create database check/generation script
description: Create scripts/ensure-db.sh that checks if hoogle database exists and generates one if missing. COMMIT 2: feat: add hoogle wrapper and database scripts (commit with vxg)

title: Create hoogle wrapper script with JSON output
description: Create scripts/hoogle-search.sh wrapper that calls hoogle CLI and returns JSON. COMMIT 2: feat: add hoogle wrapper and database scripts (commit with trc)
